title: Prisoner dies of apparent suicide in jail after being refused mental health services at state hospital

description: Plus, we speak with an Iranian graduate student about watching her nation in turmoil from a world away.

media:content.media:description: Adam Howe, charged with the murder of his mother, died by apparent suicide after being legally refused by Bridgewater State Hospital. (2013 Photo by John Tlumacki/The Boston Globe via Getty Images)
